sentences.en: A combination of operator mismanagement and design flaws caused the accident.
sentences.cn: 事故归因于操作人员处置失当,也归因于设计方面的漏洞.

sentences.en: All these mistakes and faults were caused by mismanagement.
sentences.cn: 这些错失都是由于平时管理不严造成的.

sentences.en: And who brought us to such a pass? You did, by sheer mismanagement.
sentences.cn: 谁使我们陷入这样的困境? 就是你, 纯粹由于你管理不善.

sentences.en: At present, - sized developers widespread lack of expertise, internal property mismanagement and other issues.
sentences.cn: 目前, 中小开发商普遍存在专业知识不足 、 内部产权管理不善等问题.

sentences.en: Because of mismanagement, his business has gone to hell.
sentences.cn: 因为管理不善, 他的生意搞得一塌胡涂,不可收拾.

sentences.en: Carefully mismanagement and bypass the game, please!
sentences.cn: 心地不善与游戏者请绕行!

sentences.en: Dick wasted much of the fund owing to mismanagement, so now he must pay the piper.
sentences.cn: 由于管理不善,迪克浪费了大量资金, 所以,现在他必须承担后果.

sentences.en: He accomplished little due to the mismanagement of his energies.
sentences.cn: 由于对精力分配不当,他的成就很小.

sentences.en: His gross mismanagement left the company desperately in need of restructuring.
sentences.cn: 他处理事务的严重不当使得公司急需重组。

sentences.en: Mismanagement and climate change are shrinking clean water supplies worldwide.
sentences.cn: 管理不善(mismanagement)和气候变化正在逐步削弱全球干净水资源的供应.

sentences.en: The company fails because of the chairman's mismanagement.
sentences.cn: 因为董事长的管理不善公司倒闭了.

sentences.en: The company reduced its staff as a result of mismanagement.
sentences.cn: 这个公司由于经营不善而裁减人员.

sentences.en: The company's profits are decreasing year by year due to mismanagement.
sentences.cn: 由于经营不善,公司的利润逐年递降.

sentences.en: The group last year temporarily suspended $ 367 million in funding to Uganda, citing financial mismanagement.
sentences.cn: 去年,由于乌干达政府财政管理不善,这一组织临时延期了给乌干达3亿6700万资金.

sentences.en: This blight is a symptom of cricket's mismanagement.
sentences.cn: 这一不幸源于对板球运动的不善管理.

sentences.en: This financial mismanagement really does take the biscuit.
sentences.cn: 这种不善的财政管理真得很可笑.

words.tran_cn: 办错；处置失当；对…管理不善

trans.tran_cn: 管理不善，经营不当，处置失当，处置失当
trans.tran_en: Someone's mismanagement of a system or organization is the bad way they have dealt with it or organized it
